Clients
=======

App to manage all clients. A client is mostly an organization that uses feedvay services. An organization
sits at the top level and everything such as services, entities, users and their permissions & access etc
are always in context of that organization.

Components
----------

    .. toctree::
       :maxdepth: 2
       :titlesonly:

       organization
